mapper.select: SELECT SUM(Price) as Amount, OrderChannel as GroupName, COUNT(UserId) as OrderNumb FROM order_record WHERE ShopId=#{shopId} AND Orderstatus='已完成' AND UpdateTime > #{startTime} AND UpdateTime < #{endTime} GROUP BY OrderChannel

SELECT COUNT(ShopId) as OrderNumb, OrderChannel as GroupName, SUM(Price) as Amount FROM order_record WHERE ShopId=#{shopId} AND Orderstatus='取消' AND UpdateTime > #{startTime} AND UpdateTime < #{endTime} GROUP BY OrderChannel

SELECT COUNT(*) as OrderNumb, SUM(price) as Amount, HOUR(UpdateTime) as GroupName FROM order_record WHERE ShopId=#{shopId} AND UpdateTime>#{startTime} AND UpdateTime<#{endTime} AND Orderstatus='已完成' GROUP BY HOUR(UpdateTime)

SELECT COUNT(OrderId) as OrderNumb, SUM(Price) as Amount , DAY(UpdateTime) as GroupName
, MONTH (UpdateTime) as GroupName
FROM order_record WHERE OrderStatus = #{status} AND ShopId = #{shopId} AND YEAR(UpdateTime) = #{year}
AND MONTH(UpdateTime) = #{month} GROUP BY DAY(UpdateTime)
GROUP BY MONTH(UpdateTime)
